question: UJohn ukhethe ukuzama ukushintsha indlu. Uthenge indlu ngo $80 00 wabe esebeka u$50000 wokulungisa. Inani elinyukile lendlu ngu 150%. Yingakanani inzuzo ayenzile?

UJohn ukhethe ukuzama ukushintsha indlu. Uthenge indlu ngo $80 00 wabe esebeka u$50000 wokulungisa. Inani elinyukile lendlu ngu 150%. Yingakanani inzuzo ayenzile?
<eos>
<|assistant|>
Ukubala inzuzo, kufanele sisebenzise ifomula elandelayo: Inzuzo = Inani lokutshalwa kwemali + Inani lenzuzo - Inani eliseleyo.

Ngokwezinto ozibalile, inani lokutshalwa kwemali (Initial Investment) yayingu $80,000, inani lokulungisa (Renovation Costs) yayingu $50,000, futhi inani elinyukile lendlu (Appreciated Value) liphinde libe ngu $150% walokho okutshaliwe, okungasho ukuthi singathi yi $120,000 (80,000 * 150% = 120,000).

Ngakho-ke, inzuzo (Profit) ingaba:

Inzuzo = 120,000 - (80,000 + 50,000)
Inzuzo = 120,000 - 130,000
Inzuzo = -10,000

Kodwa-ke, uma sicabanga ngokwezindleko zokulungisa, inzuzo ingaba:

Inzuzo = 120,000 - (80,000 + 50,000 + 50,000)
Inzuzo = 120,000 - 180,000
Inzuzo = -60,000

Lokhu kusho ukuthi, uma sibheka izindleko zonke, kungase kube nenzuzo engalungile. Kubalulekile ukucabangela ukuthi izindleko zokulungisa zingashintsha futhi zingahluka kuye ngokuthi izinto zithengwa nini nokuthi zilungiswa kanjani. Uma unokungabaza, kungcono ukubonisana nochwepheshe wezezimali noma umthengisi wezindlu ukuze uthole iseluleko esithe xaxa.<eos>

Impesheni yonyaka = $50000 * 2.676646
Impesheni yonyaka = $133,832.33
